snippet: The ratification of a new agreement between Major League Baseball and Nippon Professional Baseball sets the stage for a battle over pitcher Masahiro Tanaka, if his team actually posts him.
abstract: Posting agreement between Major League Baseball and Nippon Professional Baseball is completed, perhaps paving the way for the right-handed pitcher Masahiro Tanaka; pact, which caps an MLB team’s posting fee to a Japanese team at $20 million, establishes the protocols for teams to acquire Japanese players who are not yet free agents.
lead_paragraph: The ratification of a new agreement between Major League Baseball and Nippon Professional Baseball sets the stage for a battle over pitcher Masahiro Tanaka, if his team actually posts him.

headline.main: After a Posting Deal, Questions on a Pitcher
headline.print_headline: After a Posting Deal, Questions on a Pitcher
